personal.name: SABBIR
personal.title: Video Editor | Mastering Visuals
personal.bio: I’m a passionate video editor with a sharp eye for detail and a deep love for storytelling. From raw footage to polished final cut, I bring ideas to life through pacing, rhythm, color, and sound.

about.description: I’m a video editor with 1 year of experience, skilled in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects. I specialize in creating both short and long form videos that tell a story and keep viewers engaged. I focus on making videos look professional and polished by paying close attention to detail. Whether it’s for social media or other projects, I bring ideas to life through editing.

videos.title: Commercial Project
videos.description: A dynamic commercial showcasing product features with sleek transitions and engaging storytelling.

videos.title: Documentary Short
videos.description: An emotional documentary piece exploring human connections and community impact.

videos.description: High-energy music video with creative visual effects and rhythm-based editing.

videos.description: Creative short-form video that went viral, showcasing trending effects and music sync.
